description.p: You have spent most of your life in the ATUM trade. Your natural eye for good business deals has bestowed you with a talent for making rather profitable business partnerships.

ul.li: Languages: Any one language of your choice
Equipment: A set of traveller’s business clothes, a belt pouch containing 20gp, and one written business agreement from a wealthy investor.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: When I set my mind on something, it’s hard to change it.
I love tinkering with new machinery and ATUM designs.
Adventuring should always be a profitable venture for me.
I’m well known for my work, and love to talk about it.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Determination. My talents are a gift not to be be wasted. (Any)
Fairness. Just because I can, doesn’t mean I should. (Good)
Greed. What can I say? I love tech, and I love money. (Evil)
Adventure. I’m travelling for the experiences and the memories, both the good ones and the bad. (Neutral)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My workshop is my life. I’d be nothing without it..
I was run out of town by a rival business, and I want revenge.
I will be the greatest ATUM pilot this world has ever seen.
A wealthy noble has given me funding for the opportunity to lead a better life, and I shouldn’t waste that.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I enjoy find the thrill of the hunt extremely addictive.
ATUMs are giant, deadly, killing machines. I often forget that.
I’m indebted to someone who freed me from prison. One day I know they’ll expect me to repay their generous ‘favour’.
Given the option, I’m much more likely to flee and leave the fighting to my ‘allies’.

description.p: You are a resourceful talent when it comes to finding interested parties willing to do business, and often use this to fund your adventures. When residing in a settlement, you can always find a way to contact your esteemed investors; often through the use of trade representatives in the region. You can request funding, ATUMs, or other equipment for your travels from your investors, though what level of support your investors give you depends on how profitable they feel you can make it for them.
